H

HYDROGEN_ALL - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Displays implicit hydrogens on all atoms.
HYDROGEN_HETERO - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Displays implicit hydrogens on heteroatoms.
HYDROGEN_OFF - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Does not display any kind of implicit hydrogen atoms.
HYDROGEN_TERMINAL - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Displays implicit hydrogens on terminal atoms.
HYDROGEN_TERMINAL_AND_HETERO - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Displays implicit hydrogens on terminal atoms and heteroatoms.

J

JDrawComponent - Interface in com.symyx.draw
Interface for the class that renders or edits structures (molecules and reactions) in an applet or application.
JDrawEditor - Class in com.symyx.draw
Class for editing structures (molecules and reactions) in an applet, which can also have a renderer: see JDrawRenderer.
JDrawEditor() - Constructor for class com.symyx.draw.JDrawEditor
 
JDrawPreferences - Interface in com.symyx.draw
Interface for display preference settings such as how to show background color, foreground color, implicit hydrogens, bond length.
JDrawRenderer - Class in com.symyx.draw
Class for rendering structures (molecules and reactions) in an applet, which can also have an structure editor: see JDrawEditor.
JDrawRenderer() - Constructor for class com.symyx.draw.JDrawRenderer

Displays atoms of type Pol as circles that look like beads (default)
POL_STYLE_TEXT - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Displays atoms of type Pol with the text Pol

start() - Method in class com.symyx.draw.JDrawEditor
 
STEREODISPLAY_BOND_ONLY - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Color stereo bonds only for stereo center display
STEREODISPLAY_LABEL_BOND - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Color both stereo labels and stereo bonds for stereo center display
STEREODISPLAY_LABEL_ONLY - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Color stereo labels only for stereo center display
STEREODISPLAY_OFF - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Do not color stereo labels or bonds for stereo center display
STEREOLABEL_CLASSIC - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Display stereochemistry in Classic style (display all stereo labels(abs/and/or) unless it's Absolute or AND Enantiomer state.
STEREOLABEL_IUPAC - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Display stereochemistry in IUPAC style
STEREOLABEL_OFF - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Do not display stereo labels (abs/and/or)
STEREOLABEL_ON - Static variable in interface com.symyx.draw.JDrawPreferences
Display stereo labels (abs/and/or) always
